Penagih Iuran BPJS yang Nunggak Dinilai Buat Warga Resah
02 Nov 2019, 14:25 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - BPJS Kesehatan akan melakukan penagihan secara langsung kepada warga yang tidak membayar iuran BPJS. Koordinator BPJS Watch Indra Munaswar menilai penagihan ini menakut-nakuti dan mengancam masyarakat.
"Justru lebih pada menakut-nakuti masyarakat, mengancam masyarakat," ujar Indra dalam diskusi Polemik Trijaya 'BPJS Kesehatan, Kezzeel tapi Butuh' di Ibis Tamarin, Jl KH Wahid Hasyim, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Indra mengatakan, meski pihak BPJS telah menjelaskan maksud penagihan yang dilakukan oleh kader JKN, perlu adanya informasi lebih lanjut kepada masyarakat terkait kerja para penagih tersebut.
"Walaupun sudah dijelaskan oleh direksi BPJS itu hanya seperti datang, ingetin, nggak bayar, diperiksa betul nggak tidak mampu, kenapa tidak mampu, bagaimana penghasilannya, itu tugas kader JKN," kata Indra.

Unpaid BPJS Dues Collectors Assessed For Residents Worried
02 Nov 2019, 14:25 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - BPJS Health will do the billing directly to residents who do not pay BPJS contributions. BPJS Watch Coordinator Indra Munaswar thinks that this billing scare and threaten the community.
"It is more frightening the community, threatening the community," Indra said in the Trijaya Polemic discussion 'BPJS Health, Kezzeel but Need' at Ibis Tamarin, Jl KH Wahid Hasyim, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).
Indra said, although the BPJS had explained the purpose of billing carried out by JKN cadres, it was necessary to have more information to the public regarding the work of the collectors.
"Although it was explained by the BPJS directors it was just like coming in, remembering, not paying, being examined properly not being unable, why not being able to, how was the income, it was the duty of JKN cadres," Indra said.
